text: An inventor is a person who creates or discovers new methods, means, or devices for performing a task. Inventor may also refer to: *American Inventor, an American television show *Autodesk Inventor, the 3D solid modeling software *Inventor (patent), the legal term referring to the claimant of a patentable invention *Inventor (Role Variant), the Myers-Briggs role-variant *The New Inventors, an Australia television program *Open Inventor, a software development API
title: Inventor (disambiguation)
